LOOP-ART / LOOP FISH

LOOP FISH

Daniel

1685mm x 1020mm x 700mm

steel frame + abs + pp

2017.10.09

3M

Windhover沉思中心，由艺术家Nathan Oliveria系列作品命名，是斯坦福大学校园的精神避难所。 使用Oliveira的艺术作为个人更新的载体，教堂式的中心提供了从日常生活的强度的喘息。 与建筑相结合，景观提供了一系列宁静的空间，旨在全天安静的反思。 任何斯坦福大学的学生，教师或工作人员以及较大社区的成员都可以使用该中心。

I wanted the final design to be focused on people-centeredness because human factor and usability should not be afterthoughts on a hand-held devise. I nailed down a few keywords for the development themes such as personalized, expandable, and professional. In order to overcome the palm products, I had to emphasize on multi-tasking and multi-capability of the Pocket PC and make it like a mobile Swiss knife than just an electronic organizer or an address book. The final design had to look compact, elegant, intelligent and sophisticated. The final design had to work seamlessly between the hardware and the software to be able to operate the Pocket PC intuitively. To reduce the weight and size of the product, the core team came out with the expandable jacket concept . The curtail benefit of the feature jackets were designed to fit in different users in different usage scenarios without burdening too much technology into the small devise.
